name: Cat Fu Mi (itch)
description:
As far as I know, nobody beat that game yet!

This is not just a Rock Paper Scissors game with cute cats.

Each opponent acts in a pattern that you must understand to win.

These are the 5 rules of the Cat Fu Mi

  1. Your opponents may act randomly only for the first round
  2. If there is randomness after that, you will always have a clue (that may be a visual clue for exemple)
  3. Else, your opponent acts according to a pattern
  4. You need to win 5 rounds to unlock the next opponent
  5. If you lose, you restart from the first opponent
